feedback.summary: Excellent React and state management knowledge. Very strong communication skills.
Demonstrated advanced problem-solving, tackled difficult scenarios effectively.
Has basic React knowledge but struggled with advanced hooks and performance optimizations.

aiAdvice.general: Bob should refine his knowledge of advanced React patterns and provide more detailed answers on complex UI challenges.
aiAdvice.improveTechnicalSkills: Focus on hooks like useMemo/useCallback, and practice debugging performance bottlenecks in React.
aiAdvice.improveProblemSolving: Walk through coding challenges systematically, discussing trade-offs more explicitly.

feedback.summary: Strong Node.js knowledge. Great database design principles and effective communication.
Knows Node.js basics but had trouble with large-scale system design. Communication was fair.

aiAdvice.general: Michael can benefit from deeper knowledge of high-traffic server architecture and clearer communication of design trade-offs.
aiAdvice.improveTechnicalSkills: Study microservices, caching strategies, and load balancing. Build personal projects showcasing distributed systems.
aiAdvice.improveProblemSolving: Practice whiteboard sessions on large-scale database schemas and real-time data flows. Focus on clarifying assumptions early.
